src_original: kiṃ tarhi manaāyatanaṃ dhātuvyavasthāyāṃ sapta cittadhātavaḥ /  ata āha -- ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ityādi /  cakṣurādisanniśritā iti cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanakāyamanaḥsanniśritāḥ /
tgt_original: 於界門中立為七界，謂眼識界至意識界，即此六識轉為意界。

src_original: vijñaptaya iti vijñānāni /  tatra cakṣurāśrayaṃ rūpālambanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ /  evaṃ śrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanamanaāśrayāṇi śabdagandharasasparśadharmālambanāni yathākramaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānāni śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavaḥ
tgt_original: 受想行蘊、無表、無為總名法處，亦名法界。 應知識蘊即名意處，亦名七界，謂六識界及與意界。
豈不識蘊唯六識身，異此說何復為意界？ 更無異法。

src_original: kiṃ tarhi ta eva ṣaḍvijñānadhātavo 'nantaraniruddhā manodhātur ity ucyate /
tgt_original: 即於此中頌曰： 由即六識身，　　無間滅為意。

src_original: nanv evaṃ saptadaśa dhātavaḥ prāpnuvanti dvādaśa vā ,
tgt_original: 論曰： 即六識身無間滅已，能生後識故名意界，謂如此子即名餘父，又如此果即名餘種。 若爾實界應唯十七或唯十二，六識與意更相攝故，何緣得立十八界耶？

src_original: katy ādhyātmikāḥ /  aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnām iti sambadhyate /
śeṣāḥ ṣaḍ indriyadhātavaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ity ete dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ //  kati dhātavo bāhyāḥ /
tgt_original: 內十二眼等，　　色等六為外。

src_original: te tu na vijñāyanta ity ata āha -- ye sthāpitāḥ /  ete bāhyā iti boddhavyāḥ /  ke ca sthāpitāḥ /  rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmadhātavaḥ /
tgt_original: 六根、六識十二名內，外謂所餘色等六境。

src_original: ātmany asati katham ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā bhavati /

tgt_original: 我執依止故，假說心為我。

src_original: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā -- ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti /
tgt_original: 由善調伏我，　　智者得生天。

src_original: cittasya cānyatra damanam uktam -- cittasya damanaṃ sādhu ,
tgt_original: 世尊餘處說調伏心，如契經言：

src_original: cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham iti /  atra hi cittasya damanaṃ cittam eva dāntaṃ sukhāvaham ity uktam /
tgt_original: 應善調伏心，　　心調能引樂。

src_original: ato 'trāpy ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita iti cittam evābhipretam iti vijñāyate /
ataś cātmabhūtasya cittasyāśrayabhāvena pratyāsannatvāc cakṣurādīnām ādhyātmikatvam /
tgt_original: 眼等為此所依親近，故說名內。
色等為此所緣踈遠，故說名外。

src_original: evaṃ tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti ,
tgt_original: 若爾，六識應不名內，未至意位非心依故。
